Package it.polimi.ingsw.ui.gui.controller

Class ChooseNumPlayerSceneController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.ui.gui.controller.ChooseNumPlayerSceneController
All Implemented Interfaces:
SceneController
public class ChooseNumPlayerSceneController
extends java.lang.Object
implements SceneController
This class implements the choosing number of players scene of the GUI.

    • fadeImage

      private void fadeImage​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageView, javafx.scene.image.Image image)
      This method creates a fade transition of an image.
      Parameters:
      imageView - the ImageView that has to be faded.
      image - the Image to set in the ImageView.

    • slidingImage

      private void slidingImage​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageView, javafx.scene.image.Image image, int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2, int duration)
      This method creates a slide transition of an image.
      Parameters:
      imageView - the ImageView that has to be slided.
      image - the Image to set in the ImageView.
      x1 - initial x coordinate.
      y1 - initial y coordinate.
      x2 - final x coordinate.
      y2 - final y coordinate.
      duration - duration of the transtion.

    • moveImage

      private void moveImage​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageView, javafx.scene.image.Image image, int x1_1, int y1_1, int x2_1, int y2_1, int x1_2, int y1_2, int x2_2, int y2_2, int x1_3, int y1_3, int x2_3, int y2_3, int x1_4, int y1_4, int x2_4, int y2_4, int duration1, int duration2, int duration3, int duration4)
      This method is a combination of slide transition (4 transition: to left, then to right, then to left, then to right) to simulate a cloud fluctuation
      Parameters:
      imageView - the ImageView that has to be slided.
      image - the Image to set in the ImageView.
      x1_1 - first transition initial x coordinate.
      y1_1 - first transition initial y coordinate.
      x2_1 - first transition final x coordinate.
      y2_1 - first transition final y coordinate.
      x1_2 - second transition initial x coordinate.
      y1_2 - second transition initial x coordinate.
      x2_2 - second transition final x coordinate.
      y2_2 - second transition final x coordinate.
      x1_3 - third transition initial x coordinate.
      y1_3 - third transition initial x coordinate.
      x2_3 - third transition final x coordinate.
      y2_3 - third transition final x coordinate.
      x1_4 - fourth transition initial x coordinate.
      y1_4 - fourth transition initial x coordinate.
      x2_4 - fourth transition final x coordinate.
      y2_4 - fourth transition final x coordinate.
      duration1 - duration of the first transition.
      duration2 - duration of the first transition.
      duration3 - duration of the first transition.
      duration4 - duration of the first transition.

    • setLine

      private javafx.animation.Transition setLine​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageView, javafx.scene.shape.Line line, int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2, int duration)
      This method creates the line path for a slide transition.
      Parameters:
      imageView - the ImageView that has to be slided.
      line - the default line path.
      x1 - initial x coordinate.
      y1 - initial y coordinate.
      x2 - final x coordinate.
      y2 - final y coordinate.
      duration - duration of the transtion.
      Returns:
      the line transition.
